snippet.title: ScourgeBringer - Announcement Trailer | PS4, PS Vita
snippet.description: Gameplay extracts from ScourgeBringer. We see the main character fighting ennemies on a dynamic music. The trailer announces the imminent release of ScourgeBringer on PlayStation 4 and PS Vita.
